website_summaries.verdict: A hard-to-find transformer with good quality and detail that's worth grabbing when you can find it.
pros: Great design with tight joints, making poses hold well
Comes with 3 guns, 2 blasters, and police lights
Combines with other transformers in this series
cons: Good build, but can't take rough play by young children

customer_reviews.title: Nice transformer
customer_reviews.text: My son really loves his Transformers and this was a nice addition.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely great figure for Defensor
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely great figure for Defensor, however the scalper prices are pretty silly. The figure is good, but not worth the price of a Voyager class transformer. For those who missed it in late May, this guy will be available for the retail $17.99 or less again in October.
customer_reviews.author: Jett

customer_reviews.title: A rare and missing member of the team
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to the Protectobots Combiner Wars team. Not available in retail so pick one up at the right price.
customer_reviews.author: Will Yan

customer_reviews.title: Great mold! It's a shame this figure didn't come ...
customer_reviews.text: Great mold! It's a shame this figure didn't come out with the wave to form Defensor but if you do have the figures I highly suggest getting this if you're a true completist wanting the real thing and not some imitation.
customer_reviews.author: James Lee Owings III

customer_reviews.title: hard to get but so worth it.
customer_reviews.text: great toy for your defensor set of protectobots. do not pay more than msrp. check for stock often. amazon has it off and on. i am so glad i didn't have to pay scalper prices. happy hunting for this toy :)
customer_reviews.author: Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for young and old

customer_reviews.title: Groove is back

customer_reviews.title: Great figure (if you aren't scalped for it)
customer_reviews.text: As a figure, Groove is excellent. Tight joints, very posable, and an awesome alt mode. If you're looking to complete your G1 Defensor, don't spend more than 30 bucks on him.

customer_reviews.title: Deluxe class Groove

customer_reviews.title: The light piping and clear parts on the faring and guns are pretty sharp to look at
customer_reviews.text: Not the strongest entry into the Combiner Wars line, but still decent. The light piping and clear parts on the faring and guns are pretty sharp to look at.

customer_reviews.title: Broke within a month of receiving

He loves Groove but the windshield part of the motorcycle broke off and he was really upset and now he doesn't play with it because it doesn't look like a motorcycle when it transforms.

customer_reviews.title: nice toy, not as much detail as the other ...
customer_reviews.text: I managed to get this at the 18 buck price this past week. nice toy, not as much detail as the other CW figures in my opinion. Love the Blue and Red plastic on it the best. I got three....one to open, one to keep in the box, and one......just because (referencing: SNL Star Wars commercial, if you haven't seen it). I'm glad I got 3. One is bent up pretty good. Need to complete Defensor like the original
customer_reviews.author: prowl

customer_reviews.title: Leave it in arm mode.
customer_reviews.text: In short, trying to make a motorcycle that worked as a Deluxe combiner limb was a MISTAKE. Easily the worst motorcycle altmode in decades. The robot mode is so-so, but dull in color scheme.

customer_reviews.title: The item itself is fine, but I'm a collector and the box was ...
customer_reviews.text: The item itself is fine, but I'm a collector and the box was completely smashed and bent from being shoved into a smaller box. Pretty dissapointed they didnt care about how the item looked when it got to me.

customer_reviews.title: I am happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Came safe and sound. The box it shipped in was a little to small and bent the package but its not the end of the world. Over all I'm happy with it.

customer_reviews.title: I was fortunate enough to purchase this bad boy before it sold ...
customer_reviews.text: I was fortunate enough to purchase this bad boy before it sold out!!! I have not opened the toy and plan on leaving it sealed in its package. Aesthetically, this was a great mold for groove and is a much better addition to Defensor if you plan on using him as such. Other than that, I can't say much else since I won't be opening the toy.
customer_reviews.author: Megaking559

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite Combiner Wars figures.
customer_reviews.text: Very glad that hasbro keeps releasing the combiner war limbs that Takara remolds or creates altogether. Groove is awesome. It may be a point of contention for some fans that a motorcycle is the same size as a helicopter, but I always found it amusing. Amd groove looks great as Defensor's leg! Still holding out for Takara Blast Off.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

product_meta.title: Hasbro Transformers Generations combiner wars deluxe protectobot groove
product_meta.description: The Transformers battle doesn't get any bigger than this. Transformers Generations Combiner Wars figures combine to form giant super robots. Build the most powerful Combiner robots from Transformers lore, including characters like Superion and Menasor, or come up with a different combination. This Deluxe Class Protectobot Groove figure can become part of a G1-inspired Defensor Combiner build. Collect all 5 Protectobot figures (each sold separately) to create the G1 Protectobots team and build a Defensor figure in the G1 configuration. Protectobot Groove is a freedom fighter who would sacrifice his own spark if it would bring peace. He combines with his fellow Protectobots to form Defensor. Protectobot Hot Spot forms the torso, Protectobot Blades and Protectobot First Aid form the arms, and Protectobot Streetwise and Protectobot Groove form the legs. Collect all 5 Protectobot figures to complete a giant G1-inspired Defensor Combiner robot. (Figures are each sold separately.) This Deluxe Class Protectobot Groove figure changes from robot to motorcycle and back in 10 steps. It comes with a blaster accessory and a collectible character card featuring art from the Transformers Legends mobile game. Transformers and all related characters are trademarks of Hasbro.
feature_bullets: Combiner Wars Deluxe Class Protectobot Groove figure
Collect all 5 Protectobots figures (each sold separately) to complete the G1 Protectobots team
Changes from robot to motorcycle in 10 steps
Becomes an arm or a leg for a G1-inspired Defensor Combiner figure
Comes with a blaster accessory and a collectible character card
Includes Deluxe Class Protectobot Groove figure, blaster accessory, character card, and instructions

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars123 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
